description: This nonalcoholic iced tea is made with fresh mint, basil and a simple syrup infused with chamomile flowers It is as cool and refreshing as an air-conditioned subway car after a long wait on the steamy platform.
title: Three-Herb Iced Tea
title_page: Three-Herb Iced Tea Recipe - NYT Cooking
